snippet: The agency was forced to temporarily shut down its unclassified email and public websites after the attack on its computer systems.
abstract: State Department announces security breach of its computer system, becoming fourth government agency to be hacked in recent months.
lead_paragraph: The agency was forced to temporarily shut down its unclassified email and public websites after the attack on its computer systems.

headline.main: State Department Targeted by Hackers in 4th Agency Computer Breach
headline.print_headline: State Dept. Targeted by Hackers in 4th Agency Computer Breach
